about.details: Ratnabhumi Developers Limited is Ahmedabad Gujrat based company engaged in real estate and construction business. During the period 2009-2012, our Company completed the project namely Ratna TURQUOISE costing Rs 65.63 Crores. During the period 2012-17, company's main business activities were selling and marketing of its commercial offices and shops constructed in our project Turquoise. Apart from selling and marketing of its commercials offices and shops, we have rented our shops, offices and spaces in our Project Turquoise to corporate clients for their business, commercials, advertisement and installing network equipment.

contactDetails.full_address: Ratnabhumi Developers Limited, S.F. 207 Turquoise Panchvati Panch Rasta, Nr. White House, E.B. C.G. Road

faqs.question: What is the Ratnabhumi Developers IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ratnabhumi Developers IPO is a SME IPO of 3700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.31 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹63 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 4, 2017, and closes on December 6, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ratnabhumi Developers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ratnabhumi Developers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ratnabhumi Developers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ratnabhumi Developers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ratnabhumi Developers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ratnabhumi Developers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ratnabhumi Developers IPO opens on December 4, 2017 and closes on December 6, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ratnabhumi Developers IPO?
faqs.answer: Ratnabhumi Developers IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ratnabhumi Developers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ratnabhumi Developers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
